Key Match Events: Rishad Hossain scored an unbeaten 48* off 18 balls, hitting 4 sixes and 5 fours
Janith Liyanage scored a maiden ODI century with 101* off 102 balls
Taskin Ahmed took 3 wickets for 42 runs
Bangladesh won by 4 wickets with 58 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Tanzid Hasan expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
Captain Najmul Hossain Shanto remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Three players got injured in the last three overs of the first innings
Umpire Tanvir Ahmed took Richard Kettleborough's place after the latter fell sick due to the heat
Soumya Sarkar was replaced as a concussion substitute by Tanzid Hasan
